H0.text: What nationality was the pointillist artist MONDRIAN. Belgian

H1.text: What nationality was the pointillist artist MONDRIAN. French

H2.text: What nationality was the pointillist artist MONDRIAN. German

H3.text: What nationality was the pointillist artist MONDRIAN. DUTCH

A4.text: He was a Dutch painter and art theoretician who is regarded as one of the greatest artists of the 20th century.

A5.text: Mondrian was born in Amersfoort, province of Utrecht in the Netherlands, the second of his parents' children.
